encryption module

encryption.decrypt_rsa(data, private_key)[source]

Decrypts RSA encrypted data using a given private key.

Parameters:

  • data (bytes) – The encrypted data.

  • private_key (RSA.RsaKey) – The RSA private key.

Returns:

The decrypted data.

Return type:

bytes

encryption.decrypt_rsa_in_chunks(ciphertext, private_key, chunk_size=256)[source]

Decrypts RSA encrypted data in chunks using a given private key.

Parameters:

  • ciphertext (bytes) – The encrypted data.

  • private_key (RSA.RsaKey) – The RSA private key.

  • chunk_size (int) – The size of each decryption chunk in bytes.

Returns:

The decrypted data.

Return type:

bytes

encryption.decrypt_symmetric(encrypted_data, key)[source]

Decrypts symmetrically encrypted data using AES decryption with a given key.

Parameters:

  • encrypted_data (bytes) – The encrypted data.

  • key (bytes) – The symmetric decryption key.

Returns:

The decrypted data.

Return type:

bytes

encryption.encrypt_rsa(message, public_key)[source]

Encrypts data using RSA encryption with a given public key.

Parameters:

  • message (bytes) – The data to encrypt.

  • public_key (RSA.RsaKey) – The RSA public key.

Returns:

The encrypted data.

Return type:

bytes

encryption.encrypt_symmetric(data, key)[source]

Encrypts data symmetrically using AES encryption with a given key.

Parameters:

  • data (bytes) – The data to encrypt.

  • key (bytes) – The symmetric encryption key.

Returns:

The encrypted data.

Return type:

bytes

encryption.generate_key_pair()[source]

Generates a pair of RSA public and private keys.

Returns:

The RSA public and private keys.

Return type:

tuple
